trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The user-supplied `state` parameter is the object passed to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A> method that identifies the asynchronous write operation.
An enumeration value that specifies the scope of the progress changed event such as for an entire multiple document sequence, a single document, or a single page.
Based on the scope defined by writingLevel, the number of documents or the number of pages that have been written.
The percentage of data that has been written.
The user-supplied object that identifies the write operation.
Gets the number of documents or pages that have been written.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel.FixedDocumentSequenceWritingProgress>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> specifies the number of documents that have been written.

For all other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> cases, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> is the number of pages that have been written.
The number of documents or pages that have been written at the time of the event.
Gets a value that indicates the scope of the writing progress.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel.FixedDocumentSequenceWritingProgress>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> property specifies the number of documents that have been written.

For all other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> property is the number of pages that have been written.
An enumeration that indicates the scope of writing a multiple document sequence, a single document, or single page.
